div.head: To the Authour of the Expert Ferrier.
div.l: HEer's Mirrour, eak Modell of true Honour.
Fame wait's on Thy name. Thou wait'st upon Her.
By Cavall'ry the Golden Fleece th'ast wonne;
Therein, Thou art a Non p • reill, That One.
Whose Fame shall dye? Thine? It shall remaine
The age, presag'd by Ovid's sublime straine.
